{!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for being my customer.
To my existing customers, I'm honored to have the opportunity to serve you. To my new customers, I’m pleased to introduce myself as your new Univar Sales Specialist. I look forward to providing all of you the continued great service you’ve always received from Univar.
Over the next months, I plan to speak with you for a few minutes to learn more about your business and the ways Univar and I can assist you.
In the meantime, please contact me if there’s anything I can do for you. My number one priority is to help your business grow. Your success is my success.
Marco Quinto Service Specialist
